AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mages Guild alchemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with the study of the local flora, where to best to find them, and how to make use of them. From mushrooms, to flowers, [PAWN_nameDef] had spent countless hours studying it, yet promotion still seemed to be a distant dream.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mages Guild scholar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Ever obsessed with the Dwemer, [PAWN_nameDef] made it [PAWN_pronoun] life goal to to study their eternal contraptions. While many days were spent deciphering schematics, most were simply spent attempting to locate them in the first place.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mages Guild healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Fully devoted to the arts of Restoration, [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many healers to be found among the Mages Guild. While [PAWN_pronoun] could have made use of [PAWN_possessive] skills working for the local Temple, [PAWN_nameDef] found the expected pay there rather lacking.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mages Guild enchanter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the enchanters found at [PAWN_possessive] local Mages Guild hall. Turns out enchanting equipment was a very good way to earn coins, which [PAWN_nameDef] was very pleased with.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mages Guild guide
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few Guild Guides, experts in the art of Mysticism. A highly important role, as the guide network allowed for near instantaneous travel between guild halls, all for a reasonable fee of course.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mages Guild researcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was sent on a wild goose chase, tasked with investigating the disappearance of the Dwemer. Of course this was a nigh impossible task, for if the greatest minds hadn't figured it out yet, how could [PAWN_nameDef]?
